sourcesContent:
NgIf

NgIf Directive is used to add or remove items based on if condition

  • Students List Is Presents
  • Students List Is Empty

NgFor

NgFor Directive is used to iterate a list of items and then display them.

  • {{i + 1}}. {{s}}

NgSwitch

NgSwitch Directive is used to display one element from a set of elements based on a switch condition.

No Students Available

One Student Available

Two Students Available

More than Two Students Available
